headline: AI agents are the next wave of software and I’m helping builders and businesses create
highlights: Currently working at crewAI, contributing to AI development.
Holds a Confluent Fundamentals Accreditation, Bloomberg Market Concepts Certification, and Python Certification from HackerRank.
Volunteered as a Consumer Reviewer for the Rare Cancer Research Program under the U.S. Department of Defense.
Member of Black in AI and the National Society of Black Engineers (NSBE).
Involved with the National Society of Leadership and Success, enhancing leadership skills.
Authored an article on resilience titled 'Facing uncertainty and the importance of resilience'.
Educational background from the University of Pennsylvania, with coursework in Data Structures and Algorithms and Software Development.
Received the Distinguished Scholar Award from Southern New Hampshire University for academic excellence.
Experience as an NCAA Division I and II student-athlete, recognized for athletic and academic accomplishments.
Actively engages with content related to AI, technology, and career insights through LinkedIn activity.
